trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Tacoma
There were no other sightings in Tacoma on or around August 9th 2003
Summary: Never saw it as I was frozen in my room, just sounds.
divs: Sighting DetailsTestimony is all I have. I was sleeping when i herd a whirling, rushing sound, kinda like a water generator. I woke up , but was paralyzed and could not move. My window was open as it was summertime. I herd what sounded like a craft about 12-15 ft. above my window, very close. I then began to heard shuffling footsteps. Shortly after i herd two or three voices. Kinda human but robotic sounding. I could not make out there words, it was in a foreign language that I have never herd, but was very pronounce and definitely they were talking things over, calmly like they were planning or questioning. Don't know how I knew this, but I did. I never left my room and about what appeared to be 5 to 10 minutes later, after their conversation. I herd it escalate pulsate and leave. Very weird.Since for years I never believed in UFO's. I have two other times something happened to me after this even, one in 2005 in Boise Idaho another in AZ. Too much to write, quite disturbing and one physical event.
